title: Authors and Citation
text: Ww (2022). treasure: Package (Title Case). R package version 0.1.0.
code: @Manual{,   title = {treasure: What the Package Does (Title Case)},   author = {Who wrote it},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.1.0}, }

title: What the Package Does (Title Case)
text: goal treasure provide basic, generic unit-costing help malariasimulation. Functionality minimal. key goal treasure transparent version controlled repository unit cost estimates included detailed citations references cost sources. ⚠️ Cost estimates targeted --date possible. Retrospective costing past programmes may therefore require adjustment. ⚠️ living package costs updated new data available. , sure reference use specific version stable costing required project. ⚠️ exhaustive source malaria programme costs. example complete costing exercise please see Patouillard et al.

title: What the Package Does (Title Case)
text: Updates, reviews improvements encouraged via PRs! Updates citable published source. -line aim package source generic costing estimates therefore broadly representative costing given intervention, focussed specific location implementation approach. suggested update include: 1. update costing function default value. 2. Updated documentation function including citable source references section. 3. Corresponding update unit tests modified costing function.

title: What the Package Does (Title Case)
text: can install development version treasure GitHub :

title: Cost Artemether/Lumefantrine treatment — cost_al
text: Note cost per dose single dose (20/120 mg). treatment course typically constitutes Artemether + lumefantrine given twice day 3 days following weight-based guidelines: 5 <15 kg: 20/120 mg 15 <25 kg: 40/240 mg 35 <35 kg: 60/360 mg >= 35 kg: 80/480 mg course single adult (weighing >=35kg) may constitute 3 days x 2 times daily x 4 doses (4 x 20/120mg = 80/480mg) = 24 doses.

title: Cost primaquine treatment — cost_primaquine
text: Note cost per dose single dose (7.5 mg). treatment course typically constitutes primaquine 0.25 mg base/kg bw per day 14 days#' course single adult (weighing 50kg) may constitute 14 days x 0.25mg x 50kg (14 x 0.25 x 50 / 7.5) = 25 doses.

title: Cost RTS,S — cost_rtss
text: rtss_cost_per_dose Current default middle value commonly used assumed range dose costs ($2, $5, $10). true cost per currently unknown. Penny et al (2016) https://www.thelancet.com/journals/lancet/article/PIIS0140-6736(15)00725-4/fulltext. rtss_cosumables_cost Penny et al (2016) https://www.thelancet.com/journals/lancet/article/PIIS0140-6736(15)00725-4/fulltext. rtss_delivery_cost Current default recurring economic cost delivery per dose MVIP. Full Evidence Report RTS,S/AS01 Malaria Vaccine (2021) https://cdn..int/media/docs/default-source/immunization/mvip/full-evidence-report---rtss-as01-malaria-vaccine--sage-mpag-(sept2021).pdf?sfvrsn=c9737be_5.

title: Cost SMC — cost_smc
text: smc_cost_per_dose_delivered Current default average economic cost administering four monthly   SMC cycles sulfadoxine–pyrimethamine plus amodiaquine children   younger 5 years across seven countries Sahel subregion   (Burkina Faso, Chad, Guinea, Mali, Niger, Nigeria, Gambia)   2016. include multiple delivery methods (door door, fixed point,    mobile point, mixed). cost per dose delivered average cost    four monthly SMC cycles divided number cycles (3.63 / 4). Costs    2016 USD$. Gilmartin et al (2021) https://www.thelancet.com/journals/langlo/article/PIIS2214-109X(20)30475-7/fulltext.
